===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# A [[fence]].
# [[Han]], an ancient Chinese [[county]], [[viscounty]], and [[kingdom]] of the [[Zhou Dynasty]] and the [[Qin]]&ndash;[[Han]] [[interregnum]].
## The [[realm]] of this [[former]] [[state]] under other rulers.
## {{lb|zh|astronomy}} The star {{w|Zeta Ophiuchi}} in traditional Chinese astronomy, named for this state
## {{surname|lang=zh|dot=,}} [[name]]d for this [[state]]
# Common designation of Mahan (마한, 馬韓), Byeonhan (변한, 弁韓), and Jinhan (진한, 辰韓), three ancient [[tribal]] [[federation]]s located on the southern part of the [[Korean Peninsula]]
# [[Korean]] (especially [[South Korean]])
